    • Method Detail

      • calculateFitness

        public void calculateFitness()
        Used only for genetic algorithm. Calculates fitness function.

      • mutate

        public void mutate()
        Randomly mutates every non-fixed cell in the Sudoku with a chance of MUTATION_CHANCE per cell.
